DOC.brief_summary: This study is being done to understand the effects of calorie restriction and weight loss on muscle protein metabolism in adult men and women.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Calorie Restriction on Accumulation of Old, Modified Proteins in Abdominally Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy BMI will be between 30 kg/m2 38 kg/m2 and waist circumference for women ≥ 88 cm and men ≥ 104 cm Age 45 to 65 years. Male and Female Active coronary artery disease BMI < 30 kg/m2 Participation in structured exercise (>2 times per week for 30 minutes or longer) Smoking Medications known to affect muscle metabolism (beta blockers) Renal failure (serum creatinine > 1.5mg/dl) Chronic active liver disease (AST and ALT > 3 times normal) Fasting blood glucose > 126 mg/dl Anticoagulant therapy (warfarin/heparin)
